title: Preamble to the Constitution
content:
Can you identify all of the letters and the ornaments?  
Would be so appreciated.  
Thank you.

author: Lap

comments.content:
The "feather" is from Arabesque Ornaments Three MT  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/arabesque-ornaments-three-mt/arabesque-ornaments-three-mt/specs.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20150426051704/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/arabesque-ornaments-three-mt/arabesque-ornaments-three-mt/specs.html)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150426051704im_/http:/typophile.com/files/pream1_5840.jpg)

To fvilanskis and DPape:  
You both are marvelous! Yes those are perfect. I thank you so much!
